title: Summer Strolls
alt: A vibrant city square filled with people enjoying a sunny day. Families and tourists walk along the cobblestone pavement, admiring the charming architecture of the surrounding buildings. The structures exhibit a mix of styles, with balconies adorned with colorful flags and greenery on rooftops, set against a clear, blue sky. Shops line the street, enhancing the lively atmosphere as pedestrians engage in leisurely activities.
location: La plaza de Sant Jaume, Barcelona, Spain
